Requirements for Admission

The Nursing and Midwifery Council of Nigeria which is the umbrella body that regulates the educational activities of the college stipulates that prospective student must have obtained at least a credit in the following subjects:
1. Mathematics
2. English
3. Biology
4. Chemistry
5. Physics
These credits must have been obtain in not more than 2 sittings. The exams must have been conduct by recognized institutions (WAEC, NECO, NABTEC).
Note: For Nabtec, only one sitting is allowed.
Interested candidates can obtain an application form at the cost of #17000 which must be paid into this bank account…..
